vernac_cmds: Local Infix "?=" := compare (at level 70, no associativity).
Lemma compare_eq_iff x y : (x ?= y) = Eq <-> x==y.
case compare_spec; intro H; split; try easy; intro EQ; contradict H; rewrite EQ; apply irreflexivity.
Lemma compare_eq x y : (x ?= y) = Eq -> x==y.
Lemma compare_lt_iff x y : (x ?= y) = Lt <-> x<y.
case compare_spec; intro H; split; try easy; intro LT; contradict LT; rewrite H; apply irreflexivity.
Lemma compare_gt_iff x y : (x ?= y) = Gt <-> y<x.
case compare_spec; intro H; split; try easy; intro LT; contradict LT; rewrite H; apply irreflexivity.
Lemma compare_nlt_iff x y : (x ?= y) <> Lt <-> ~(x<y).
Lemma compare_ngt_iff x y : (x ?= y) <> Gt <-> ~(y<x).
Hint Rewrite compare_eq_iff compare_lt_iff compare_gt_iff : order.
intros x x' Hxx' y y' Hyy'.
case (compare_spec x' y'); autorewrite with order; now rewrite Hxx', Hyy'.
case compare_spec; intros; trivial; now elim irreflexivity with x.
Lemma compare_antisym x y : (y ?= x) = CompOpp (x ?= y).
case (compare_spec x y); simpl; autorewrite with order; trivial; now symmetry.
Lemma le_not_gt_iff : forall x y, x<=y <-> ~y<x.
Lemma lt_not_ge_iff : forall x y, x<y <-> ~y<=x.
Lemma le_or_gt : forall x y, x<=y \/ y<x.
rewrite le_lteq; destruct (O.compare_spec x y); auto.
Lemma lt_or_ge : forall x y, x<y \/ y<=x.
rewrite le_lteq; destruct (O.compare_spec x y); iorder.
Lemma eq_is_le_ge : forall x y, x==y <-> x<=y /\ y<=x.
Lemma compare_le_iff x y : compare x y <> Gt <-> x<=y.
Lemma compare_ge_iff x y : compare x y <> Lt <-> y<=x.
Infix "?=" := compare (at level 70, no associativity) : order.
Tactic Notation "elim_compare" constr(x) constr(y) := destruct (compare_spec x y).
Tactic Notation "elim_compare" constr(x) constr(y) "as" ident(h) := destruct (compare_spec x y) as [h|h|h].
Definition eq_sym (x y:t) : x==y -> y==x := Equivalence_Symmetric x y.
Definition eq_trans (x y z:t) : x==y -> y==z -> x==z := Equivalence_Transitive x y z.
Definition lt_trans (x y z:t) : x<y -> y<z -> x<z := StrictOrder_Transitive x y z.
Lemma lt_dec : forall x y : t, {lt x y} + {~ lt x y}.
intros x y; destruct (CompSpec2Type (compare_spec x y)); [ right | left | right ]; order.
Definition eqb x y : bool := if eq_dec x y then true else false.
Lemma if_eq_dec : forall x y (B:Type)(b b':B), (if eq_dec x y then b else b') = (match compare x y with Eq => b | _ => b' end).
intros; destruct eq_dec; elim_compare x y; auto; order.
Lemma eqb_alt : forall x y, eqb x y = match compare x y with Eq => true | _ => false end.
intros x x' Hxx' y y' Hyy'.
Lemma lt_eq x y z : x<y -> y==z -> x<z.
Lemma eq_lt x y z : x==y -> y<z -> x<z.
Lemma le_eq x y z : x<=y -> y==z -> x<=z.
Lemma eq_le x y z : x==y -> y<=z -> x<=z.
Lemma neq_eq x y z : ~x==y -> y==z -> ~x==z.
Lemma eq_neq x y z : x==y -> ~y==z -> ~x==z.
Lemma le_lt_trans x y z : x<=y -> y<z -> x<z.
Lemma lt_le_trans x y z : x<y -> y<=z -> x<z.
Lemma le_trans x y z : x<=y -> y<=z -> x<=z.
Lemma le_antisym x y : x<=y -> y<=x -> x==y.
Lemma le_neq x y : x<=y -> ~x==y -> x<y.
Lemma lt_le x y : x<y -> x<=y.
Lemma eq_not_gt x y : x==y -> ~ y<x.
Lemma lt_not_gt x y : x<y -> ~ y<x.
Lemma le_lteq : forall x y, le x y <-> lt x y \/ eq x y.
Lemma compare_spec : forall x y, CompSpec eq lt x y (compare x y).
intros; unfold compare, eq, lt, flip.
destruct (O.compare_spec y x); auto with relations.
Module Type CompareBasedOrder (Import E:EqLtLe')(Import C:HasCmp E).
Axiom compare_eq_iff : forall x y, (x ?= y) = Eq <-> x == y.
Axiom compare_lt_iff : forall x y, (x ?= y) = Lt <-> x < y.
Axiom compare_le_iff : forall x y, (x ?= y) <> Gt <-> x <= y.
Axiom compare_antisym : forall x y, (y ?= x) = CompOpp (x ?= y).
Module Type CompareBasedOrderFacts (Import E:EqLtLe') (Import C:HasCmp E) (Import O:CompareBasedOrder E C).
case_eq (compare x y); intros H; constructor.
Lemma compare_eq x y : (x ?= y) = Eq -> x==y.
Lemma compare_gt_iff x y : (x ?= y) = Gt <-> y<x.
Lemma compare_ge_iff x y : (x ?= y) <> Lt <-> y<=x.
Lemma compare_ngt_iff x y : (x ?= y) <> Gt <-> ~(y<x).
Lemma compare_nlt_iff x y : (x ?= y) <> Lt <-> ~(x<y).
Lemma compare_nle_iff x y : (x ?= y) = Gt <-> ~(x<=y).
destruct compare; split; easy || now destruct 1.
Lemma compare_nge_iff x y : (x ?= y) = Lt <-> ~(y<=x).
Lemma lt_eq_cases n m : n <= m <-> n < m \/ n==m.
Module Type BoolOrderFacts (Import E:EqLtLe') (Import C:HasCmp E) (Import F:HasBoolOrdFuns' E) (Import O:CompareBasedOrder E C) (Import S:BoolOrdSpecs E F).
Lemma leb_nle x y : x <=? y = false <-> ~ (x <= y).
Lemma leb_gt x y : x <=? y = false <-> y < x.
Lemma ltb_nlt x y : x <? y = false <-> ~ (x < y).
Lemma ltb_ge x y : x <? y = false <-> y <= x.
Lemma leb_refl x : x <=? x = true.
Lemma leb_antisym x y : y <=? x = negb (x <? y).
Lemma ltb_irrefl x : x <? x = false.
Lemma ltb_antisym x y : y <? x = negb (x <=? y).
Lemma eqb_compare x y : (x =? y) = match compare x y with Eq => true | _ => false end.
Lemma ltb_compare x y : (x <? y) = match compare x y with Lt => true | _ => false end.
Lemma leb_compare x y : (x <=? y) = match compare x y with Gt => false | _ => true end.

command: case compare_spec; intro H; split; try easy; intro EQ; contradict H; rewrite EQ; apply irreflexivity.
case compare_spec; intro H; split; try easy; intro LT; contradict LT; rewrite H; apply irreflexivity.
case compare_spec; intro H; split; try easy; intro LT; contradict LT; rewrite H; apply irreflexivity.
intros x x' Hxx' y y' Hyy'.
case (compare_spec x' y'); autorewrite with order; now rewrite Hxx', Hyy'.
case compare_spec; intros; trivial; now elim irreflexivity with x.
case (compare_spec x y); simpl; autorewrite with order; trivial; now symmetry.
rewrite le_lteq; destruct (O.compare_spec x y); auto.
rewrite le_lteq; destruct (O.compare_spec x y); iorder.
intros x y; destruct (CompSpec2Type (compare_spec x y)); [ right | left | right ]; order.
intros; destruct eq_dec; elim_compare x y; auto; order.
intros x x' Hxx' y y' Hyy'.
intros; unfold compare, eq, lt, flip.
destruct (O.compare_spec y x); auto with relations.
destruct compare; split; easy || now destruct 1.
